meanings.definition: A salt or ester of oleic acid.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the oleate under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: The oleate was used in the production of soap.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally added too much oleate to the recipe, creating a unique flavor.
meanings.sent4: The oleate acted as a bridge between the oil and the acid in the experiment.
meanings.sent5: The oleate formed a smooth layer on the surface of the solution.

meanings.definition: To treat or combine with oleic acid.
meanings.sent1: She decided to oleate the metal to prevent rusting.
meanings.sent2: The company oleates their products to enhance their properties.
meanings.sent3: The gardener oleated the plant leaves, making them shine in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: He oleated the ingredients together, creating a perfect blend.
meanings.sent5: The mechanic oleated the gears, ensuring smooth operation.
